body_html:
it is strange that recent GPU related CI checks on master branch can still pass without libnccl-dev installed.
e.g. https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/ae1f1de9-f91b-4138-b89d-d56b3dfebb80

@gunan, does current CI check still use ci_build.sh to build inside a docker container?
